data.text: Sungai munondo wenyu parutivi, imi wamasimba,
Miseve yenyu inopinza ngaibaye mwoyo yavavengi vamambo;
Chigaro chenyu, imi Mwari, chichagara nokusingaperi-peri;
Imi munoda kururama uye munovenga zvakaipa;
Nguo dzenyu dzose dzinonhuwirira mura, arosi nekasia,
Vanasikana vamadzimambo vari pakati pavakadzi vanokudzwa;
Mwanasikana wamambo akanaka kwazvo mukati meimba yake; nguo yake yakarukirirwa negoridhe.
Akapfeka nguo dzakashongedzwa achaperekedzwa kuna mambo;
Vanakomana venyu vachatsiva nzvimbo yamadzibaba enyu;
Ndichaita kuti kurangarirwa kwenyu kurambe kuripo, kusvikira kuzvizvarwa zvose;
